mapper.select: SELECT re.id id, re.create_time createTime, re.`name` `name`, re.url url, re.description description, re.category_id categoryId FROM ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN ums_role ro ON ro.id = ar.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation rrr ON ar.role_id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_resource re ON rrr.resource_id = re.id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND re.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY re.id

SELECT r.id, r.admin_count admin_count, r.create_time create_time, r.description description, r.`name` `name`, r.sort sort, r.`status` `status` FROM ums_admin_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON arr.role_id = r.id WHERE arr.admin_id = #{adminId}
